fn.p: The authors have declared that no competing interests exist.

Conceived and designed the experiments: MM CEM MT. Performed the experiments: MT MM CEM. Analyzed the data: MT CEM MM. Wrote the paper: MT CEM VC ND ED JPG LG TL PSL FMD MM. Provided the epidemiological data: JPG. Provided the meteorological data: VC. Participated to result interpretation: VC, ND, ED, LG, TL, FMD. Provided help with part of the analysis: PSL. Wrote the manuscript: MT. Critically revised the manuscript: CEM VC ND ED JPG LG PSL FMD MM.
